inclusion.criterion: Willing to take the planned antibiotic treatment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Planning to deliver at 1 of the study sites
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to come back for follow-up visits for 1 year after the baby is born
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Have taken antibiotics, except for syphilis or gonorrhea, within the last 2 weeks
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Are allergic to penicillin, ampicillin, erythromycin, or metronidazole
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has abdominal pain and vomiting due to acute edematous interstitial pancreatitis with enlarged common bile duct and intrahepatic duct confirming gall stone pancreatitis.
